notification_email.subject: Internet Scans from Satellite.cs.washington.edu
notification_email.text:
This is a notification that we will be running an internet-wide scan from satellite on Monday.

Source IPs for the probes will be 198.48.92.101-104.

Scan will begin on Monday and last roughly 24 hours.
Maximum scan rate will be 500k packets/second.
Scan will cover the full address space.
I am the emergency contact, you can reach me by email.
